channel.title: "Pirate Radio" aka "The Boat That Rocked" - Movie
channel.description:
Have you guys seen this movie? I watched it last night and enjoyed it alot. Its about the British government trying to silence a offshore radio station during the 60's, even though they had 1/4 the population listening everyday and 93% of the population sided with the radio station in a public opinion poll "according the movie." Im not anti-england or anything but the movie was pretty interesting.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qX1SSiFWF-s]Trailer[/url] [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1131729/]IMDB[/url]
